summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Guardian AI application after fixes. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). All requested features verified: location updated to Crested Butte, About page shows 'Since 2014', Payment Methods section added, Team section removed, admin authentication works. Found 1 UI interaction issue with Stripe checkout button.

ui_bugs.issue: Checkout button has element interception issues - overlays prevent clicking
ui_bugs.details: Button is present and backend API works, but UI overlays (navbar, cards) intercept click events. Backend Stripe API returns valid checkout URLs when called directly.

passed_tests: Backend API health check (12/12 endpoints working)
Homepage loads with 3 unique services (no duplicates)
Service cards link to correct service pages
All 3 service pages load correctly with pricing
Contact page shows Crested Butte, Colorado, USA location
About page has Payment Methods section
About page Team section correctly removed
Admin login works with admin@guardianai.com / admin123
Admin dashboard loads with stats and data
Contact form submission works with success message
Stripe checkout API returns valid checkout URLs (backend)
Navigation between all pages works correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Stripe checkout button UI interaction issue - overlays are intercepting click events. Backend API works correctly, but frontend button clicks are blocked by navbar/card overlays.
